nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, an unidentified Trandoshan was being held as a prisoner in the Republic Judiciary Central Detention Center in the Galactic City on Coruscant. He wore an orange colored prison jumpsuit.

This Trandoshan was located in the detention facility's mess hall along with a fellow Lutrillian prisoner when Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi, disguised as the bounty hunter Rako Hardeen, entered the room.
Later on, when a prison riot ensued, the Trandoshan escaped from the mess hall and fled down a corridor alongsde with a Lutrillian and a Rodian. However, he was felled by a stun blast from a Clone trooper guard.
